definition: woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
lit. try to straighten out silk threads only to tangle them further (idiom)/fig. to try to help but end up making things worse

sentences.english: What do you like best, apples, pears, or bananas?
sentences.chinese: 平棼，梨，喷喷鼻蕉，您最喜好哪个？

sentences.english: We have no apples at home. I'll go and buy some.
sentences.chinese: 家中出有平棼了，我往购一些。

sentences.english: She likes to eat an apple.

definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/irresolute
